GSD.description:
dm integrity: fix memory corruption when tag_size is less than digest size

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.112 by commit cd02b2687d66f0a8e716384de4b9a0671331f1dc. For more details please see the references link.
